thread.section_title: Midnight Hotel Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Automatic upgrade in an already nice hotel
thread.title_full: Automatic upgrade in an already nice hotel - Review of Midnight Hotel Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Hethatmustnotbenamed
title: Automatic upgrade in an already nice hotel
text:
My Partner and I had originally booked in for just a few nights at the hotel but then needed to extend by a day. The hotel was very accommodating allowing us to stay in the room we had without further issues. The place has a boutique feel to it.
The room was clean, quiet, well and recently furnished and with a large enough bathroom to swing the proverbial cat (if that's how you travel).
We didn't take breakfast or eat there but there is a restaurant and its location very close to both Gare du Nord and Gare del'Est means that it's very easily accessible by foot and with reasonable eating options nearby.
If you're happy to walk, it's generally near to most of the central attractions and if you don't the Metro is very close by.
Very Happy to recommend this place !
Room Tip: Ask for one ! See more room tips
